sentences.english: It is a difficult problem to decrease the amount of nitrite in a normal limit of vegetables pickling.
sentences.chinese: 亚硝酸盐含量超标一直是腌渍蔬菜生产中的一个难题。

sentences.english: Marinated chicken dark meat, grilled and served with spicy and sour sauce.
sentences.chinese: 精选上等去骨鸡腿肉，以独门酱料腌渍后，上架薰烤。

sentences.english: Pour all of the marinade ingredients in a bowl and mix well.
sentences.chinese: 将腌渍的材料全部倒在一个碗里搅拌均匀。

sentences.english: The second is good pickled flavor.
Each slice is carefully seasoned, then slow roasted.
sentences.chinese: 每片肉条都经仔细腌渍，然后慢烤而成。

sentences.english: Wash the shelled shrimps and mix with marinade for 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 虾球洗净后用腌料搅拌均匀，腌渍30分钟。

sentences.english: Ingredients silver pomfret pickled flavor, making the dry starch vegetables, flowers Salt and pepper dip eating.
sentences.chinese: 主料银鲳腌渍味，拍上干淀粉制成菜，蘸花椒盐进食。

sentences.english: When cool drain the red onion and discard the pickling liquid.
sentences.chinese: 当完全冷却后，过滤掉腌渍酱只取紫洋葱备用。

sentences.english: Profile control in the fish on both sides of ramp straight knife, pickled with salt.
sentences.chinese: 在鱼身两面剖上斜直刀，用精盐腌渍。

sentences.english: Pork ribs cut into inch long pieces, pickled it to be tasty.
sentences.chinese: 猪的排骨切成寸长小段，将它进行腌渍入味。

definition: marinated/to make by pickling, salting or curing
